New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for most 3s on debut for the Mavericks with 6
Key Match Events: Klay Thompson's 22 points and 6 three-pointers contributed to the Mavericks' 120-109 win over the Spurs
Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson expressed happiness and relief after his strong debut
Others: Luka Doncic scored a game-high 28 points in the match
